summary: This customizer allows you to edit the textures the Bijin Wives mod installed. Now you can choose from a wide collection of different textures.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Verdana][img]http://imageshack.com/a/img921/1645/76gJzC.png[/img][/font][font=Verdana]

[color=#93c47d][size=3][b][i][url=https://www.facebook.com/ClearanceClarenceMods][img]http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/640x480q90/924/cG7PGI.png[/img][/url]
[/i][/b][/size][/color]

[size=3][color=#e69138][b][i]Screenshots are Wanted! If some of you could upload some screenshots it would be much appreciated![/i][/b][/color][/size]

[size=3]This mod allows you to change the way Camilla Valerius, Ysolda, Sylgja, Temba, Taarie, Muiri, Senna, Grelka and Morwen looks. You can change the body textures, face and eyes. Download the mod with NMM to use the XML installer![/size]

[img]http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/320x240q90/922/tUyKv0.png[/img]

[size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63473/?]Bijin Wives[/url][/size]
[size=4]If you plan to use  TBBP meshes, you also require the following:[/size]
[size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?]HDT Physics Extensions[/url][/size]
[size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54044/?]HDT Breast And Butt Physics[/url][/size]
[size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/?]XP32 Maximum Skeleton - XPMS [/url] or [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/?]XP32 Maximum Skeleton Extended - XPMSE[/url][/size]

[img]http://imageshack.com/a/img924/2578/9D7W5O.png[/img]

[color=#0b8db3][size=6]Manual Installation[/size][/color]
[size=3]Download the package you want and extract it using WinRar. Now you have 3 folders. Base, FOMod and Options. Delete the FOMod folder since you won't need it. Now go to the base folder and select the bodytype you want and open that folder and copy the .nif files to [i][color=#93c47d]data\meshes\actor\character\Bijin wives[/color][/i] and overwrite the .nif files. Now the body for every character is installed. Now go into the options folder and chose what kind of texture you want. The new version of the Bijin Wives split the textures into sets and you'll need to copy the textures you want into the folders for every set. The sets are found in [i][color=#93c47d]data\textures\actor\character\Bijin Wives 00 and 01[/color][/i]. You only need to copy the textures to set 00 not 01. I have removed SeveNBase as an installer. If you still insist on using them just copy the SeveNBase meshes over to the mesh folder above since UNP and SeveNBase uses the same textures[/size]

[color=#0b8db3][size=6]One of them looks weird[/size][/color]
[size=3]Some of the followers still have some basic textures in their unique folders. If one of the characters look weird go to the folder for the character and see if there is any body textures there. If there is just duplicate the corresponding texture from the set she was using to the character folder. The problem should now be solved[/size]

[color=#0B8DB3][size=6]Credits[/size][/color]
[size=5][color=#0B8DB3]Body Meshes[/color][/size]

[size=3][color=#0A7A9B]CBBE Meshes[/color][/size]
[size=3][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Edition -CBBE-[/url][/i][/size]

[size=3][color=#0A7A9B]UNP Meshes[/color][/size]
[size=3][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?]DIMONIZED UNP[/url][/i][/size]
[size=3][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37900/?]UNP Blessed Body[/url][/i][/size]
[size=3][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40156/?]UNPC Body v2dot5[/url][/i][/size]
[size=3][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35748/?]UNPetite[/url][/i][/size]
[size=3][i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41051/?]UNP Topmodel[/url][/i][/size]

[size=5][color=#0B8DB3]Body/Face Texture[/color][/size]

author: ClearanceClarence

files.name: Bijin Wives Customizer - CBBE - 1.5.0
files.changelogHtml:
Updated to a new and better version of the framework for the installer
Removed Mature V1, Milkdrinker and Barbarian textures
Added Demoniac, SKY Female and Leyenda as a texture options
Added support for v1.1
Does no longer support v1.0

files.changelogHtml: Updated to add new eyes for the new characters implemented in v1.1 of Bijin Wives mod and V1.5.0 of this mod
